external_links.context: Note: The information in this section does not apply to drinking water that is not prepackaged, such as municipal water supplies. Health Canada's webpage on drinking water provides information on non-prepackaged drinking water.

external_links.text: List of permitted supplemented food categories
external_links.context: Water to which vitamins and minerals (except fluoride) have been added are Supplemented foods . Refer to item 1 "carbonated or non-carbonated water-based beverages" in the List of permitted supplemented food categories for more information.

external_links.text: D. Sodium/Salt Related Statements and Claims
external_links.context: Claims such as "sodium-free" are permitted provided that the product meets the compositional and labelling requirements set out in section D. Sodium/Salt Related Statements and Claims of the Table of Permitted Nutrient Content Statements and Claims. Note that such a claim will trigger the Nutrition Facts table requirement on bottled water that might otherwise be exempt .
